Ich bin 27 Jahre alt und komme aus Neust: I am 27 years old and come from Neustadt-Glewe, Northern Germany. In the Corona time I was looking for a new passion. After a few tutorials, I knew it was programming.
Schnell wurde ich auf die Developer Akad: I quickly became aware of the Developer Academy. In March 2022, I decided to continue my education and have been programming many hours since then.
In dieser Zeit habe ich mit ausgebildete: During this time I worked with trained programmers and was able to record the first successes with HTML, CSS, Javascript and Angular.
Haben Sie ein Problem zu lösen?: Do you have a problem to solve?
Benötigen Sie einen Frontend-Devepoler?: Do you need a front-end devepoler? Please feel free to contact me via this form. I am interested in listening to you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work
